Description:
Detects disabling security tools

Author: Ömer Günal, Alejandro Ortuno, oscd.community
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Disabling Security Tools
Query: sourcetype like 'linux-%' eql select * from _source_ where ((process_path like '%/systemctl' and (command like '%stop%' and command like '%falcon-sensor%')) or (process_path like '%/service' and (command like '%iptables%' and command like '%stop%')) or (process_path like '%/service' and (command like '%ip6tables%' and command like '%stop%')) or (process_path like '%/chkconfig' and (command like '%ip6tables%' and command like '%stop%')) or (process_path like '%/chkconfig' and (command like '%cbdaemon%' and command like '%off%')) or (process_path like '%/systemctl' and (command like '%cbdaemon%' and command like '%stop%')) or (process_path like '%/systemctl' and (command like '%cbdaemon%' and command like '%disable%')) or (process_path like '%/chkconfig' and (command like '%iptables%' and command like '%stop%')) or (process_path like '%/systemctl' and (command like '%firewalld%' and command like '%stop%')) or (process_path like '%/systemctl' and (command like '%firewalld%' and command like '%disable%')) or (process_path like '%/service' and (command like '%cbdaemon%' and command like '%stop%')) or (process_path like '%/setenforce' and command like '%0%') or (process_path like '%/systemctl' and (command like '%disable%' and command like '%falcon-sensor%')))
